description: RJS Racing's Pro Sportsman 2 Man Radio System is the most economical radio system offered through RJS racing. It is the perfect choice for bracket racers, 1/8 mile drag racers, stock car, drag boat and even tractor pull racing. The sportsman 2 is a complete system for the vehicle, driver and crew member. Radios come complete with battery, belt clip antenna and desk top charger. Available in kit or individual form.
